sentence.Network_en: Be bold in doing your work and don't be overcautious.
sentence.Network_cn: 工作你尽管大胆去做,别缩手缩脚的.

sentence.Network_en: We should boldly give them work and promote them and not be overcautious.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们要放手地任用和提拔他们,不要畏首畏尾.

sentence.Network_en: Better , after all, to be overcautious rather than unnecessary risks.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是于一转念, 又觉得实在并无可笑, 小心一点总比冒险好.

sentences.sentence: "sometimes it doesn't pay to be overcautious in business"

auth_sentence.content: How do we get our battered, overcautious banks to lend?
